text: mire (visvasule) manavajati (hitam) koraku nilabettabadina uttama samajam varu. Miru dharmanni adesince (bodhince) varu mariyu adharmanni nisedhince (nirodhince) varu mariyu miru allah yandu visvasam kaligi unnavaru. Mariyu okavela granthaprajalu visvasiste, varike melai undedi. Varilo kondaru visvasulu kuda unnaru. Kani atyadhikulu avidheyule (phasikhun)
